Title: Relates to a constitutional right to hunt, trap and fish
Summary: Relates to the right to hunt, trap and fish; provides for regulation by the state.
LawCode: Ren Art 20 to be Art 21, add Art 20 ยง1, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to the constitution, in relation to the right to hunt, trap and fish
